title: Help
content: I want to skip isa 1 due to health issue i heard that they can shift  weightage to Esa any idea about procedure  like medical certificate  submission  like that?

comments.body: I had a guy, who had symptoms of Chickungunya, so he had to skip one of the ISA exams......eventually he submitted the necessary reports to the HOD, they verified it with the doctors.....later they changed his ESA from 50% to 70% weightage......this is a recent one I am talking about....like the nov 1st sem ISA-1......I have confirmed this with the person.....so you can rely on this.....but remember, they wont give shit iff you skipped for a fucking fever cough and cold stufss......atb
Can you tell me whom I have to met first?
I am not sure, but if ur from 2nd sem then it should be the chairperson of S&H Department...
